document_data.name: Kalitrates
document_data.mainbody: '''Kalitrates''' was a [[drow]] [[elf]] working with the slaver ring undercover in the [[Oasis of the White Palm]] in [[Raurin]] in the {{yearlinkName|1356}}.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|78}}
document_data.Activities: Kalitrates stood guard just outside of the room where [[Zomara]] stayed. He would be ready to assist if he heard noise elsewhere in the compound, however.
document_data.Possessions: Kalitrates had a [[short sword]] and [[dagger]], [[chain mail]], and a small [[shield]]; all of these were enchanted. He also wielded a single [[javelin]] coated with [[Drow knockout poison|drow poison]]. Finally, he wore ''[[boots of elvenkind]]'' and a ''[[cloak of elvenkind]]'', which eased his avoidance of fire-based attacks. All of his equipment would soon disintegrate if exposed to sunlight.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|79}}
